```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

# Read Data
```{r}
epi_info <- read_csv(file = "./data/Our World Data/full_data.csv")
locations <- read_csv(file = "./data/Our World Data/locations.csv")
```
## Country Data
```{r}
US <- epi_info %>%
     filter(location == "United States")
China <- epi_info %>%
     filter(location == "China")
World <- epi_info %>%
     filter(location == "World")
Germany <- epi_info %>%
     filter(location == "Germany")
Italy <- epi_info %>%
     filter(location == "Italy")
UK <- epi_info %>%
     filter(location == "United Kingdom")
NonWorld <- epi_info %>%
     filter(location != "World")
```

# Plot

## World
```{r, fig.cap= "World Data"}
ggplot(aes(x = date, y=new_cases), data = World) +
     geom_point() 
```

## Country
```{r, fig.cap="non World"}
ggplot(aes(x = date, y=new_cases), data = NonWorld) +
     geom_point() 
```

